cmp: 回 ((a measure word for matters or actions) a time/to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Islam)
mng: to curve, to return, to revolve
to curve, to return, to revolve

exm.mng: roundabout route, circuitous, tortuous, to outflank, indirect, roundabout
to shun, to avoid (sb), to skirt, to evade (an issue), to step back, to withdraw, to recuse (a judge etc)
to turn around, maneuvering room, leeway

exm.pyn: xún huí fēn xī duān kǒu

exm.mng: to echo, to reverberate, to respond, echo, response, reaction
